  3. Sgurr na Ciste Duibhe

Sgurr na Ciste Duibhe

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Sgurr na Ciste Duibhe is southernmost of the Five Sisters of Kintail and offers magnificent views down Loch Duich. Its finest feature is the elegant eastern ridge over the Top of Sgurr nan Spainteach.

 You have not climbed Sgurr na Ciste Duibhe.

Region: Kintail

Altitude: 1027 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 4.08/5
Rating: 4.1/5 (62 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Five Sisters of Kintail traverse

Other routes and challenges

Sgurr na Ciste Duibhe is almost invariably climbed along the Five Sisters ridge - over Sgurr nan Spainteach from Beinn na Lapain to the east, or via Sgurr na Carnach to the north.

The traverse of the Five Sisters is a long and demanding walk in its own right; the super-fit may attempt to extend it by also including the three further Munros of the Brothers ridge, and perhaps even Ciste Dhubh as well.
